title: You-6 K2 Minamimuki
sinopse:
A string of stories about various people who live in the same town, and how their complicated romantic/sexual relationships connect them to each other.

(Source: MU)

1. Goodbye Rain
2. Nettaiya no Astrology
3. Rojou Shijin wa Megane no Yume wo Miru ka
   4-5. Tsugaru Yuki
   6-7. You-6 K2 Minamimuki
